pull.title: depends: Enable bdb unicode support for Windows
pull.body: define `UNICODE` and `_UNICODE` while compiling for Windows. This would make dbd read filename as utf8 string.

rename.from: depends: Enable unicode support on dbd for Windows
rename.to: depends: Enable bdb unicode support for Windows

events.message: depends: Enable unicode support on dbd for Windows

events.body: It could, but without unicode support from leveldb, the gains are rather limited.
